text: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles is a fantasy action movie. It was made in the United States and released in 2014. It is part of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (TMNT) series. The movie is the first in the rebooted TMNT movie series. It is the first TMNT movie to use motion capture for the turtles. The movie was financially successful and got a sequel called Out of the Shadows in 2016 but had bad reviews. ==References== Category:2014 action movies Category:2010s superhero movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Platinum Dunes movies Category:Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles movies Category:Reboot movies
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014 movie)
